topic: philippines evacuates 3,000 people after activity increases at mayon volcano

text: Breaking news is coming in from the Philippines
A massive evacuation effort is underway due to volcanic activity
The Mayon Volcano is at the center of the evacuation efforts
Thousands of people are being relocated to safer areas
Over 3,000 people have already been evacuated from the surrounding areas

identity_keyword: Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology
text: The Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology is monitoring the situation
The institute has confirmed increased seismic activity at the Mayon Volcano
The evacuation order is in place to ensure public safety
The government is working to mitigate the impact of the volcanic activity
The evacuees will receive food, shelter, and other essential assistance
The situation remains volatile and is being closely monitored
It's still unclear what the next 24 hours will bring
Further evacuations and potential eruptions are still a possibility
The situation is being closely watched by authorities and the public alike
